title: Gatsby Francais
description: DEDEDJEIDOED off your next, great Gatsby project with this default-starter-intl. This barebones starter ships with the main Gatsby configuration files you might need.
author: @anhek

hero.job_description: J'aime concevoir des applications cohérentes et intuitives grâce avec des pixels et du code.

about.title: À Propos
about.text1: I’m a graphic designer based in Lyon, France. I moved into development and my daily play field consists of html, scss, javascript and react. I like to learn new things everyday, challenge myself and help others.
about.text2: I love hip-hop culture, beyond meat burgers, last.fm and spotify. I do street-workout, meditation and self-reflection.
about.text3: I’m currently looking for a junior front-end developer position. You can find me on twitter, linkedin, github and codepen.

notfound.description: La page que vous recherchez n'existe pas :(
